<S%H3588>"When<s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H4191>dies<s%> and <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H4191>deceased<s%> shall not be [married] <S%H2351>outside<s%> [the family] to a <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%> Her husband's <S%H2993>brother<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> in to her and <S%H3947>take<s%> her to himself as <S%H802>wife<s%> and <S%H2992>perform<s%> the <S%H2992>duty<s%> of a husband's <S%H2992>brother<s%> to her.

"And it shall be that the first-born <S%H834>whom<s%> she <S%H3205>bears<s%> shall <S%H6965>assume<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> that his <S%H8034>name<s%> may not be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7121>summon<s%> him and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him. And [if] he <S%H5975>persists<s%> and <S%H559>says,<s%> 'I do not <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> her,'

<S%H3588>"If<s%> [two] <S%H376>men,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H251>countryman,<s%> are <S%H5327>struggling<s%> <S%H9191>together,<s%> and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7126>comes<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the one who is <S%H5221>striking<s%> him, and <S%H7971>puts<s%> out her <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H2388>seizes<s%> his <S%H4016>genitals,<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to you along the <S%H1870>way<s%> when you <S%H3318>came<s%> out from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>
